name: Trijam 124 - The last Bomb
description:
Hi there,

this is the submission for the Trijam 124 (theme "dead last");

my interpretation: Inspired by bomberman, I made a little game where you drop bombs every 5 seconds automatically; your goal is to eliminate enemies while not killing yourself;

INSTRUCTIONS: 

  • Play with Edge browser (Chrome doesn't like it)
  • Bombs drop automatically after 5 seconds and detonate after 2 seconds
  • Bombs show a rough outline of the blast radius - obviously keep out of it :)
  • Kill all enemies and you get to the next level (5 total levels)

I had grandiose ideas that you might have to kill enemies in the correct order, but I couldn't think of a good quick way so I scrapped the idea. 

After the feedback from the last few Trijams, I added a sound effect and focussed a bit more on gameplay and levels; that was always a bit lacking; as always, I tried to make my hand drawn graphite drawings :)

All other assets are made by myself.
